name: Unto Mononen
description: '''Unto Uuno Mononen'''  (23 October 1930 in [[Pravdino, Krasnoselskoye Settlement Municipal Formation, Vyborgsky District, Leningrad Oblast|Muolaa]] â€“ 28 June 1968 in [[Somero]]) was a [[Finland|Finnish]] [[songwriter]] and [[musician]]. He is best known for his numerous [[tango music|tango]] compositions including the famous Finnish tango song, ''"[[Satumaa]]".'' His first name was originally Uuno.
